scripts.build-model: cd models && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-server: cd server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build-model && npm run build-server && npm run build-client
scripts.deploy-aws: npm run build && cd server && eb deploy
scripts.deploy-stage-patch: npm run build && npm run patch && npm run deploy-stage
scripts.deploy-stage-minor: npm run build && npm run minor && npm run deploy-stage
scripts.deploy-stage-major: npm run build && npm run major && npm run deploy-stage
scripts.deploy-stage: current_branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && version=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git checkout stage && git merge $current_branch -m "New stage deploy: v$version" && git push origin stage && git checkout $current_branch
scripts.deploy-production: version=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git checkout production && git merge stage -m "New production deploy: v$version" && git push origin production && git checkout main
